text: Koraa, ‘aha, tomalokara oparata tomalokara pratipalake yi haraama karaiche seya tilarata karai suna'om ye, ‘tomaloke te'omra lagata kako ansidara sthapana nakaraiba, pitr-matrra lagata sadbyarahara karaiba, daraidratara bhayata tomaloke nija santanaka hatya nakaraiba, amiye'i tomalokaka arau sihamtaka jiraika dana karao. Prakasya ha'omka athaba gopane'i ha'omka, aslila karmara ocaralaike'o nayaba. Allahe haraama karaa kono naphachaka yathartha karanabihina tomaloke taka hatya nakaraiba’. Te'om tomalokaka e'i nirdesa dile yate tomaloke bujiba paraa
